title: Contagion
content:
Contagion Level 5 Necromancy Spell Poison a target and possibly afflict them with a disease of your choice. Until Long Rest Melee CON Save Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Necromancy Spell

Poison a target and possibly afflict them with a disease of your choice.

Contagion is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Contagion is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Necromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
